doc.title: North Pole #6
doc.plot: The movie consists of five unconnected vignettes, book-ended by performances by Peter North. In the first scene, two women (Jewel De'Nyle, JD and Katie June, KJ) dressed for an evening out come down a grand staircase. JD is dark haired, fit, voluptuous and slightly over-puffed while KJ is brunette, athletic and a little soft. They meet a man (Peter North, PN) at the foot of the stairs. Together, all three enter a bedroom. There is little preamble to the scene. PN plays the scene with driving intensity. KJ doesn't quite keep up with him but JD matches his intensity. The scene is notable for a segment where JD works PN from the back while KJ works him from the front. The scene reaches an excellent conclusion in trademark PN fashion in the mouth of JD and on the chests of JD and KJ. In the second scene, a blond, voluptuous woman (Bonita Saint, BS) beckons a man (Steve Jagger, SJ) across a room. JS is barely up for the job, despite the determined ministrations of BS. Surprisingly, the scene reaches a very good conclusion on her chest and stomach. The third scene features a plain, blond, athletic woman (Elana, E) on a couch, in front of a fire, with a pudgy man (John Strong, JS). JS is not quite up to the job and neither generates much heat. The scene reaches a so-so conclusion on her face and mouth. The fourth scene starts with a couple (Charlie, C and Danté, D) in bed. C is dark haired, slightly soft and voluptuous but needs better support. D asks if he can work her from behind. Eventually, she agrees. D is not quite up to the job and neither generates much heat. The scene reaches a so-so conclusion on her face and mouth. The final scene starts with a couple (Amber Michaels, AM and PN) at home, in their house in the hills, after work. AM is blond, fit, voluptuous and slightly over-puffed. There is little preamble to the scene. AM is notable for her piercings and PN applies himself to her lowest one. AM responds enthusiastically and is quite athletic throughout the scene but she never seems to engage with PN. PN brings the scene to an excellent conclusion on her chest.
